mapper.select: select room_num, room_name, type, max, price, hotel_num, room_config, room_local, room_img from room where max = #{head_count} and hotel_num = #{hotel_num} and room_num not in (select room_num from book where (check_in < to_date(#{check_in}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI') and check_out > to_date(#{check_out},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI')) or (check_in < to_date(#{check_out},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI') and check_out > to_date(#{check_in}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI')) or (check_in >= to_date(#{check_in}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI') and check_out <= to_date(#{check_out},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI')))

insert into book values (bookseq.nextval, #{member_num}, to_date(#{check_in},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI'), to_date(#{check_out}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI'), #{room_num}, #{head_count}, #{book_memo}, 0, sysdate, #{add_bed}, #{breakfast_count})
insert into member values (memberseq.nextval, 'nc_id', 'nc_password', #{name}, sysdate, sysdate, 'nc_email', #{phone}, 'NC', 'user.svg')
